column4: I just installed gdesklets with snyaptic.. did nothing else. It.. doesn't start. One of the FAQ's said to check the logfile at ~/.gdesklets.. I'm a nub at Linux, could someone please tell me how I can at least view that? I don't know how exactly to "get to it"
how are you trying to start it
I have Xfce.. pretty much right-clicking > Accessories > Gdesklets
